Articles.Content:
The current skybox in ksp is extremely dull.

As evidenced by this panorama even the real life sky is more vibrant!

![1280px-ESO_-_The_Milky_Way_panorama_%28by%29.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a1/ESO_-_The_Milky_Way_panorama_%28by%29.jpg/1280px-ESO_-_The_Milky_Way_panorama_%28by%29.jpg)
